website_summaries.verdict: This simple, inexpensive, and energy efficient HP monitor is a worthwhile option, especially if you are on a budget.
cons: It’s a fine monitor, but will not work for gamers or those that require stronger resolution or faster refresh rate

customer_reviews.title: Versa mountable and 1920x1080 resolution
customer_reviews.text: Very nice monitor. Comes with standard versa mount, which is becoming less common. Be aware, there are two different sizes for this monitor with nearly the same model number. The one that ends in "i" is a true 24 inch monitor, thus will output to 1920x1200. The one I received is a 23.8 inch and has a maximum resolution of 1920x1080.
customer_reviews.author: Woodworks

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor for the price.
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this is the monitor and stand is that it can be angled in so many way. The monitor slides up and down the stand for height adjustment. The base stays in one place and you can turn the stand on the base. I have two of these at work and I love them. My desk used to be height adjustable with arms for my monitor. My new off and desk are not height adjustable, but with the stock stands I at least have the ability to do so with the base stands. I love the Res, please not I have not changed much outside of turning the brightness down to 30% - 33%.
customer_reviews.author: Luk

customer_reviews.title: The Most Awesome Monitors Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional writer for a large corporation. I purchased two of these monitors for my home office. For writing and other typical office tasks, they are perfect. No glare, extremely readable and clear. The minimal outer frame makes two together look like a single large monitor. The adjustable stands enables one to set the monitor at the perfect height. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using with Surface Pro 6 and HP Envy laptop
customer_reviews.text: Work-from-home made this a necessity. Set-up was a breeze for this non-technical person. I had to buy a cable (mini display port to display port) to connect the Surface, and the HDMI to HDMI cable in the box connects the monitor to my old laptop. Switching between the two inputs is accomplished with the touch of a button on the underside of the monitor. I "extended" both displays to be able to drag windows to the monitor and work without looking down (sore neck). As for the performance, I said I wasn't a technical person, but it is fine for everything I need. Perfect for adding screen real estate when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: CasualComfort

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is amazing. It doesn't have built in speakers, but I purchased a compatible sound bar by HP and it snapped right on the bottom (see image). The monitor has a lot of customization options. The buttons on the bottom right of the monitor is how to access these options. It includes low blue light, night and reading. I use the reading, very comfortable on the eyes. It comes with a lot of different connection ports, and they provide all the cabling in the box. I'm so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!

I like that you can easily adjust the monitor. It was easy to assemble. Also love that there is minimal frame- monitor is pretty much all screen

product_meta.title: HP EliteDisplay E243 | 24" Monitor | HD IPS Screen | Silver | 1FH47A8
product_meta.description: Style meets substance in a strikingly modern business display crafted for optimal viewing, productivity, and ergonomics. The HP EliteDisplay E243 23.8-inch Monitor has a 3-sided micro-edge bezel for seamless multi-display tiling and 4-way adjustability so you can comfortably power through your day. Build a complete solution with optional HP accessories like an HP Single Arm to take the display off the desk, an HP USB Graphics Adapter for multi-display setups or an HP S100 Speaker Bar for space-saving audio.
feature_bullets: Crafted for optimal productivity and ergonomics with a 3-sided micro-edge bezel, 4-way adjustability, and 100mm VESA pattern mount
Find your most comfortable, productive position with adjustable tilt, height, swivel, and up to 150 mm height adjustment settings
Crisp visuals from any angle with 1920 x 1080 Full HD resolution, 23.8 inch diagonal IPS screen
Work with your most frequently-used devices with VGA, HDMI, and DisplayPort
Connect your USB accessories right at the display with two USB 3.0 ports
Low halogen, ENERGY STAR certified, EPEAT Gold registered display that meets TCO Certified Edge with 85% Post-Consumer Recycled plastics
Design the screen for how you work with HP Display Assistant software, which enables screen partitioning
Rest assured that your IT investment is supported by a three-year standard limited warranty
